name: Sun Run: Extreme
description:
Sun Run: Extreme is an endless shooter. It features Coop, and has multiple power ups to aid you in your journey.

Controls 

WASD - Movement

Space - Shoots

B - Bomb

P - Pause

Controller Controls

Left Thumbstick - Movement

Right Trigger - Shoots

X/A - Bomb

Start - Pause

Right now the game goes on forever. After 300 points all the current enemies will be spawnable. Coop requires two controllers to be played.

Credits: 

FunwithPixels for asteroid
Carlos Alface for enemy sprites
maxstack for main menu theme
Jesús Lastra for shooting sounds
